byline.contributor: Anne Mancuso reported from Hastings-on-Hudson, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. Alain Delaquérière and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By ANNE MANCUSO and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Two workers are killed when backyard fuel tank explodes at home in Hastings-on-Hudson, NY; cause of explosion is undetermined.
lead_paragraph: The workers were removing an old tank at a home in Hastings-on-Hudson when it exploded, the mayor said; the cause has not yet been determined.

headline.main: 2 Workers Killed When Backyard Fuel Tank Explodes in Westchester County
headline.print_headline: 2 Workers Die When Backyard Fuel Tank Explodes in Westchester County

snippet: The workers were removing an old tank at a home in Hastings-on-Hudson when it exploded, the mayor said; the cause has not yet been determined.
